[h1] DISCLAIMER: This is a first impressions review, and NOT a full review [/h1]

Counter-Strike: Condition Zero is a game developed and published by Valve, and is the sequel to the classic FPS shooter

The game offers some nice graphics, although some ugly glitches here and there, it is pleasant all the same

Counter-Strike: Condition Zero overall, however, is a fun game to play, and it does get boring if being played for a long time, but is a very good action game and to play in short bursts

[h1] RECOMMENDED :) [/h1]

[b] REVIEW SOURCES: [/b]

[*] None

Сюжет: Что? Сюжет? Не, не слышал.
К чему здесь задания вообще не понимаю, это даже кампанией сложно назвать, просто без всякой причины нас посылают на место где мы должны убить 5 человек из снайперской винтовки (к примеру). К покупке не советую, игра чисто для количества игр в Steam, стоит брать лишь CS Bundle по акции вместе с ней.

TLDR: An underrated classic!

General info
⚪️ GENRE:  FPS PVP and PVE team and objective based
⚪️ GRAPHICS: Like OG CS but slightly better, typical beginning of 2000s game graphics 
⚪️ STATE: Fully released in 2004, still has a small community
⚪️ SOUNDTRACK: Typical shooter music with trumpets 

Pros
🟢 Cool Tour Of Duty campaign mode with many missions and challenges 
🟢 High variety of weapons and maps 
🟢 Can be played both online and offline
🟢 Easy to run
🟢 Bots are quite smart (more than CSGO) and can really help you win
🟢 You can download additional campaigns and even make your own! They even bundled the game with a guide 
🟢 All the other pros of CS 1.6

Cons
🔴 Old and outdated (not a fair con but important nonetheless)
🔴 The game can be repetitive at times
🔴 Some sounds are quite annoying (especially with the tutor)
🔴 The UI is not very intuitive. Beginners may need time to get used to it
🔴 Most servers are empty. Some are still active though
🔴 All the cons of CS 1.6

🟢🟢🟢 More pros than cons, but I’m trying to be equal :)

Final rating: 8/10 If you liked 1.6 you’re gonna love this!

Thanks for reading my review!

PS: I nodded the fuck out of this game. Go to gamebanana.com/games/7. It makes the game even better ;)

★★★☆☆ (3/5) - 
카운터 스트라이크 시리즈의 유일한 범작. 
원작 카운터 스트라이크와 소스 버전 사이의 낀 세대.
캠페인이랍시고 집어넣은 요소들은 상당히 재미가 없다.
Норм,но сюжета нету,да и скучная по ботам стрелять.
Em comparação com o Counter-Strike 1.6 este melhorou bastante os gráficos. Aprovado!

Counter Strike: Condition Zero это CS 1.6 с некоторыми доработками. А именно: доработана физика стрельбы, немного изменены модельки оружий, персонажей и т.д, а также изменены карты, и добавлены новые.
Вообщем, игра хорошая, мне она понравилась даже больше CS 1.6. Рекомендую!
